Package apes.strong.together.services

Class HostDetailsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • apes.strong.together.services.HostDetailsService
  • public class HostDetailsService
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates collection HostDetails which stores host's parameters

      • addToHostNameAndHostDetailsFromSCCM

        public void addToHostNameAndHostDetailsFromSCCM​(java.lang.String[] splitSCCMContent)
        Creates an entry for a host if it's not present in the collection. Takes an array of host's parameters from a SCCM file and adds them to the collection.
        Parameters:
        splitSCCMContent - single line from a SCCM file split into parameters

      • addToHostNameAndHostDetailsFromLastScan

        public void addToHostNameAndHostDetailsFromLastScan​(java.lang.String[] splitLastScanContent)
        Creates an entry for a host if it's not present in the collection. Takes an array of host's parameters from a LastScan file and adds them to the collection.
        Parameters:
        splitLastScanContent - single line from a LastScan file split into parameters

      • addToHostNameAndHostDetailsFromCCE

        public void addToHostNameAndHostDetailsFromCCE​(java.lang.String[] splitCCEContent)
        Creates an entry for a host if it's not present in the collection. Takes an array of host's parameters from a CCE file and adds them to the collection.
        Parameters:
        splitCCEContent - single line from a CCE file split into parameters

      • calculateOccurrenceTable

        public java.lang.Integer[] calculateOccurrenceTable()
        Calculates how many hosts are in each file
        Returns:
        array of Integers containing information about occurrence of hosts

      • printOccurrenceForAllHosts

        public void printOccurrenceForAllHosts()
        Export information about hosts: whether it is present in SCCM, CCE and LastScan files, what is its operating system and is it persistent

        Sets what operating system is installed on the machine

        Sets if host is persistent, non-persistent or unknown
